trans-unit.source: Represents a configuration element for a service to be added to the workflow runtime engine.
A <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Configuration.WorkflowRuntimeServiceElement> specifies a host service that should be initialized and activated by the workflow runtime engine.
It corresponds to a host service specified in the <`Services`> element in a configuration file.

Because the service specified in a WorkflowRuntimeServiceElement will be initialized by the workflow runtime engine it must have at least one constructor that matches one of the following four signatures (the workflow runtime engine will try to match these signatures in the order shown):
Service(WorkflowRuntime runtime, NameValueCollection parameters)
Service(WorkflowRuntime runtime)
Service(NameValueCollection parameters)
Service()
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Configuration.WorkflowRuntimeServiceElement"></xref> class.
If you use this constructor, you must explicitly set <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Configuration.WorkflowRuntimeServiceElement.Type%2A>.
Called when an unknown attribute is encountered while deserializing the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Configuration.WorkflowRuntimeServiceElement"></xref>.
The name-value pair specified by name and value is added to the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Configuration.WorkflowRuntimeServiceElement.Parameters%2A> collection.

Any attributes other than `type` that are specified in an <`add`> element to the <`Services`> element in the configuration file are added as a name-value pair to the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Configuration.WorkflowRuntimeServiceElement.Parameters%2A> collection.
The name of the unrecognized attribute.
The value of the unrecognized attribute.
<xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Configuration.WorkflowRuntimeServiceElement.OnDeserializeUnrecognizedAttribute(System.String,System.String)"></xref> always returns `true`.
Gets the parameters for this service.
A <xref href="System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection"></xref> that specifies the parameters for the service.
Gets or sets the assembly-qualified type name of the service.
The assembly-qualified type name of the service.
An attempt to set <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Configuration.WorkflowRuntimeServiceElement.Type"></xref> to a null reference is made.
